newsitem.title: USA: Fed seen adding reserves via overnight system RPs.
newsitem.headline: Fed seen adding reserves via overnight system RPs.

text.p: The Fed is expected to add reserves to the banking system via overnight system repurchase agreements Tuesday, analysts said.
Fed funds remained tight today at 5-13/16 percent after trading well above 6.0 percent Monday.
High Treasury balances at the Fed was said keeping pressure on funds.
Monday, the Fed added reserves through overnight system RPs, totalling $8.65 billion.
